title: Print, Portfolio cover from "Die Quelle:  Flächen Schmuck" [The Source:  Flat Ornament], Vienna:  Verlag M. Gerlach, 1901, 1901
title_raw: Portfolio cover from "Die Quelle:  Flächen Schmuck" [The Source:  Flat Ornament], Vienna:  Verlag M. Gerlach, 1901
medium: Exterior:  Lithograph on linen; interior:  lithograph on paper
provenance:
Historical Design Inc., New York
Jerrol E. Golden, San Francisco
dimensions:
25.4 x 30.5 x 1.5 cm (10 x 12 x 1/4 in. ), closed
25.4 x 62.5 with 12.0 cm flap (10 x 24 5/8 with 4 3/4 in. flap), open
description: Checkerboard design with text arranged in pale pink rectangles down center of sheet: in first rectangle:  "Die Quelle / Herausgegeben / v. Martin Gerlach; second rectangle: Flächen / Schmuck / v. Kolomon Moser; third rectangle:  Wien / Leipzig / Verlag / M. Gerlach u. Co. ["The Source / Presented by Martin Gerlach / Ornament for Flat Surfaces / by Kolomon Moser / Vienna / Leipzig / Publisher / M. Gerlach and Co.".]  Profile women wearing long black robes facing in alternating directions. Inside cover same motif printed in gray on cream.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Portfolio cover from "Die Quelle:  Flächen Schmuck" [The Source:  Flat Ornament], Vienna:  Verlag M. Gerlach, 1901, 1901. Exterior:  Lithograph on linen; interior:  lithograph on paper. 
Gift of Jerrol E. Golden. 1999-41-1-1
